title: SoftAssertionsExtension does not show line numbers
body:
assertj 3.18.1
junit 5.7.0

### Extension
```java
@ExtendWith(SoftAssertionsExtension.class)
class MyTest {

    @Test
    void bla(SoftAssertions softly) {
        softly.assertThat("a").isEqualTo("a");
        softly.assertThat("b").isEqualTo("a");
        softly.assertThat("c").isEqualTo("a");
        softly.assertThat("a").isEqualTo("a");

    }
}
```

The output does not contain the line numbers:
```
INFO: Using test instance lifecycle mode 'PER_CLASS' set via the 'junit.jupiter.testinstance.lifecycle.default' configuration parameter.


Expecting:
 <"b">
to be equal to:
 <"a">
but was not.
Comparison Failure: 
Expected :"a"
Actual   :"b"
<Click to see difference>




Expecting:
 <"c">
to be equal to:
 <"a">
but was not.
Comparison Failure: 
Expected :"a"
Actual   :"c"
<Click to see difference>

but was not.

but was not.
```

### Static method

But using the static method it does show the line number and even the full stack trace (arguably too much though):

```java
class MyTest {

    @Test
    void bla() {
        SoftAssertions.assertSoftly(softly -> {
            softly.assertThat("a").isEqualTo("a");
            softly.assertThat("b").isEqualTo("a");
            softly.assertThat("c").isEqualTo("a");
            softly.assertThat("a").isEqualTo("a");
        });
    }
}
```

